item.title: CUBE Boutique Capsule Hotels has opened a new location in Kampong Glam
item.description: From left: Supriya Ghosh, Principal Consultant at CUBE as emcee; Tay; and Choa at the launch of the CUBE Boutique Capsule Hotel at Kampong Glam. The new CUBE Boutique Capsule Hotel in Kampong Glam increases RB Hospitality’s inventory of affordable lodging options by 56 beds. Situated within revitalized historic districts, RB Hospitality specializes in providing budget-friendly accommodations in culturally significant areas. This opening complements their existing successful capsule hotel in Singapore’s Chinatown.
